mapper.select: SELECT rs.shop_id, rs.available_day, rs.available_start_time, rs.available_end_time, rs.lunch_start_time, rs.lunch_end_time, s.reservation_term FROM reservation_setting rs JOIN shop s ON rs.shop_id = s.shop_id WHERE rs.shop_id = #{shopId} AND rs.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY rs.available_day ASC
